sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving `HTTPS`.

sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving `HTTPS`.

watch.description: Watches for changes and rebuilds application.

liveReload.description: Whether to reload the page on change, using live-reload.

publicHost.description: Public URL where the application will be served.

open.description: Open the application in the browser.

allowedHosts.description: This option allows you to whitelist services that are allowed to access the dev server.

memoryLimit.description: Memory limit for type checking service process in `MB`.

baseHref.description: Base url for the application being built.
